original_title: アイドルとしてAKB48として ～岡部 麟・倉野尾成美が立っている場所～
overview: The documentary follows Okabe Rin and Kuranoo Narumi, two members of Team 8, as they rise into the competitive battlefield of AKB48's Senbatsu for the first times. It's a great look into what it means to rank in to the Senbatsu through the elections versus being hand picked for a Senbatsu, as well as into these two individual members themselves!
title: As an Idol, As AKB48 - The Place where Okabe Rin and Kuranoo Narumi Stand
